|lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CompexWRT;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 36-57 |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = AC (direct) |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/2018 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 ARM @1.7GHz CPU *1GB DDR3 System Memory *256MB NAND Flash *32MB NOR Flash *2x MiniPCIe Slots with PCIe 2.0 *1x MiniPCIe Slot with PCIe 2.0 and USB 2.0 *5x Gigabit LAN RJ45 with Auto-MDI/X *1x USB 3.0 port *2x SIM holder *1x IEEE 802.3af/at POE, 36~57V, up to 70W (4-pair power feed) on WAN Port ===Applications=== *Optimized for 4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac module support *Tri-Band MU-MIMO 802.11abgn/ac Access Point *Dual Concurrent MU-MIMO 802.11an/ac Access Point *Wireless Base Station *3G/LTE AP ===Ordering Configuration===

WPQ865 6B04PR32F1GBR-TE         IPQ8065          CPU board with 2 MiniPCIe slot
